Game.Name: NBA Pro Basketball - Bulls vs Lakers (Japan)
Game.plot: The Greatest Playoffs in NBA History! New Teams. New Players. New Moves. Real NBA action now featuring all 16 of the 1991 NBA Playoff teams. Plus the East and West All-Stars! New features: Watch Michael's moves over and over with EASN's instant replay! EASN 'T' Meter lets you control the power and accuracy of critical foul shots. Check current game stats any time.
